transcript.text: ♪ We're talking away ♪
♪ I don't know what I'm to say ♪

♪ Today's another day to find you ♪
♪ Shying away ♪

♪ Take on me, take on me ♪
♪ Take me on, take on me ♪
♪ I'll be gone ♪

♪ So needless to say ♪

♪ Say after me ♪

♪ Take on me, take on me ♪
♪ Take me on, take on me ♪
♪ I'll be gone ♪

♪ Oh, things that you say, yeah ♪
